quiz.question: How much money did the Assyrian King gain from Hezekiah?
options: Three hundred talents of silver and thirty talents of gold
Two hundred talents of silver and fifty talents of gold
quiz.answer: Three hundred talents of silver and thirty talents of gold

quiz.question: How many Assyrians died when the angel of the Lord went out?
What did Eliakim, Shebna and Joah do?
options: They ran to help the Assyrians
They helped each other commit suicide
They told King Hezekiah what the field commander had said
quiz.answer: They told King Hezekiah what the field commander had said

quiz.question: What language did Eliakim, Shebna and Joah prefer the field commander to speak?

postQuiz.text: After answering their questions, the reporters disperse. They have given you $100 for each question you answered correctly.
